```{r}
library(moderndive)

library(ggplot2)

data("early_january_weather")

early_january_weather
```

This dataset has `r nrow(early_january_weather)` rows and `r ncol(early_january_weather)` columns.
It includes variables including `r names(early_january_weather)`.
The mean temperature in the dataset is `r mean(early_january_weather$temp)`.

```{r}
ggplot(early_january_weather, aes(x = time_hour, y = temp, color = humid))+ 
  geom_point()
```
